i1.name: Ionian Fervor
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Irelia''' gains a [[stack]] of ''Ionian Fervor'' for every enemy {{tip|champion}} hit by her [[Champion ability|abilities]], or if she hits at least one non-champion, stacking up to 5 times. ''Ionian Fervor'' lasts for 6 seconds, with basic attacks against enemy champions and large and epic {{tip|monster|monsters}} and ability hits refreshing the duration.

{{sbc|Ionian Fervor:}} '''Irelia''' gains {{as|{{passive progression/deprecated version|changedisplay=true|key=%|8 to 16|1;7;13}} {{sti|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} per stack, up to {{as|{{passive progression/deprecated version|changedisplay=true|key=%|8*5 to 16*5|1;7;13}}|attack speed}}.

At maximum stacks, '''Irelia's''' [[basic attack]]s deal {{as|{{passive progression/deprecated version|15 to 66}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 25% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} [[on-hit]].
i1.descriptionHtml: Innate: Irelia gains a stack of Ionian Fervor for every enemy champion hit by her Champion ability, or if she hits at least one non-champion, stacking up to 5 times. Ionian Fervor lasts for 6 seconds, with basic attacks against enemy champions and large and epic monsters and ability hits refreshing the duration.Ionian Fervor: Irelia gains Unknown value: passive progression/deprecated version changedisplay=true key=% 8 to 16 1;7;13 bonus attack speed per stack, up to Unknown value: passive progression/deprecated version changedisplay=true key=% 8*5 to 16*5 1;7;13.At maximum stacks, Irelia's basic attacks deal Unknown value: passive progression/deprecated version 15 to 66 (+ 25% bonus AD) bonus magic damage on-hit.

q1.name: Bladesurge
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} Enemy champions and large monsters hit by {{ai|Flawless Duet|Irelia}} and {{ais|Vanguard's Edge|Irelia}} initial barrage are {{as|marked|buzzword}} for 5 seconds.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Irelia''' {{tip|dashes}} through the target enemy's location, dealing {{as|physical damage}}, applying {{tip|on-hit|on-hit effects}} and {{tip|heal|healing}} herself. ''Bladesurge'' deals increased damage to {{tip|minions}}.
''Bladesurge's'' {{sti|cooldown}} is reduced to {{fd|0.2}} seconds upon consuming a {{as|mark|buzzword}}, and resets if the target dies to or shortly after ''Bladesurge'' has completed.
q1.descriptionHtml: Passive: Enemy champions and large monsters hit by Flawless Duet and Vanguard's Edge's initial barrage are marked for 5 seconds.Active: Irelia dashes through the target enemy's location, dealing physical damage, applying on-hit effects and healing herself. Bladesurge deals increased damage to minions.Bladesurge's cooldown is reduced to 0.2 seconds upon consuming a mark, and resets if the target dies to or shortly after Bladesurge has completed.
leveling:
{{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|5 to 85}} {{as|(+ 60% AD)}}|Minion Bonus Damage|{{ap|55 to 135}}|Minion Total Damage|{{ap|5+55 to 85+135}} {{as|(+ 60% AD)}}}}
{{st|Heal|{{as|{{ap|12 to 20}}% AD}}}}
q1.notes:
* ''Bladesurge'' deals {{tip|basic damage}}, but also triggers spell effects by dealing an additional 0 {{tip|spell damage}}.
* If the target dies to ''Bladesurge'' and was also {{as|marked|buzzword}}, the cooldown is still fully refunded.
* ''Bladesurge'' will only allow '''Irelia''' to dash through walls if there is enough space for her on the other side.
* ''Bladesurge'' won't deal damage if the {{tip|dash}} is {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}}.
** But the damage cannot be dodged via instant displacement (i.e - {{ai|Urchin Strike|Fizz}}).

effects.levelingtext:
{{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|5 to 85}} {{as|(+ 60% AD)}}|Minion Bonus Damage|{{ap|55 to 135}}|Minion Total Damage|{{ap|5+55 to 85+135}} {{as|(+ 60% AD)}}}}
{{st|Heal|{{as|{{ap|12 to 20}}% AD}}}}

w1.name: Defiant Dance
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Irelia''' {{tip|channel|charges}} for up to {{fd|1.5}} seconds, during which she [[damage modifier|reduces]] incoming {{as|physical damage}} by 50% {{as|(+ 7% per 100 AP)}} and increases ''Defiant Dance's'' damage over the duration. ''Defiant Dance'' can be recast at any time within its duration and cannot be {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}} by {{tip|crowd control}}.

At the end of the duration, after a {{rutngt|0.05}} delay, '''Irelia''' swipes with her blades in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies around her and in a line, increased by {{passive progression/deprecated version|11|key=%|type=channel time|0 to 100|0 to 0.75|formula=10% per 0.075 seconds. ''This is capped at 0.75 seconds.''}}.
''Defiant Dance's recast can be used while affected by {{tip|crowd control}}.''
w1.descriptionHtml: Active: Irelia charges for up to 1.5 seconds, during which she damage modifier incoming physical damage by 50% (+ 7% per 100 AP) and increases Defiant Dance's damage over the duration. Defiant Dance can be recast at any time within its duration and cannot be interrupted by crowd control.At the end of the duration, after a Unknown value: rutngt 0.05 delay, Irelia swipes with her blades in the target direction, dealing physical damage to all enemies around her and in a line, increased by Unknown value: passive progression/deprecated version 11 key=% type=channel time 0 to 100 0 to 0.75 formula=10% per 0.075 seconds. This is capped at 0.75 seconds..Recast: Irelia swipes with her blades early.Defiant Dance's recast can be used while affected by crowd control.
leveling: {{st|Minimum Damage|{{ap|10 to 70}} {{as|(+ 50% AD)}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}}|Maximum Damage|{{ap|10*2 to 70*2}} {{as|(+ 100% AD)}} {{as|(+ 80% AP)}}}}
w1.notes:
* Quick Casting utilizes hold-and-release for the two casts.
* ''Defiant Dance'' reaches 100% physical damage reduction at {{as|{{fd|714.29}} AP}}.
* The swipe will cast from wherever '''Irelia''' is at the end of the cast time.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Irelia''' is {{tip|channel|channeling}}:
{{ct|charge|cast=false|items=false|move=false|consume=Disabled, but can still use trinkets|spells=true,false,false,false,recasts|interrupts=death}}

effects.levelingtext: {{st|Minimum Damage|{{ap|10 to 70}} {{as|(+ 50% AD)}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}}|Maximum Damage|{{ap|10*2 to 70*2}} {{as|(+ 100% AD)}} {{as|(+ 80% AP)}}}}

• Minimum Damage: (+ 50% AD) (+ 40% AP)
  • Maximum Damage: (+ 100% AD) (+ 80% AP)

e1.name: Flawless Duet
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Irelia''' sends a blade to the target location for {{fd|3.5}} seconds, after which she sends out a second blade at her position, though not if she is channeling {{ai|Defiant Dance|Irelia}} or {{si|Teleport}}. ''Flawless Duet'' can be recast after {{fd|0.15}} seconds.

Once both blades have been placed, they fly toward each other regardless of distance after a {{fd|0.25}}-second delay, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies struck and {{tip|sight|revealing}} and {{tip|stun|stunning}} them for {{fd|0.75}} seconds after converging.
{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Irelia''' sends out the second blade early to the target location.
''Flawless Duet's recast can be used while affected by {{tip|crowd control}} and during {{ais|R|Irelia}} cast time.''
e1.descriptionHtml: Active: Irelia sends a blade to the target location for 3.5 seconds, after which she sends out a second blade at her position, though not if she is channeling Defiant Dance or Teleport. Flawless Duet can be recast after 0.15 seconds.Once both blades have been placed, they fly toward each other regardless of distance after a 0.25-second delay, dealing magic damage to enemies struck and revealing and stunning them for 0.75 seconds after converging.Recast: Irelia sends out the second blade early to the target location.Flawless Duet's recast can be used while affected by crowd control and during R's cast time.
e1.notes:
*Both casts count as an ability activation for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{nie|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
**If the ability is not manually recasted, the secondary effect will trigger and it will be considered as an ability activation. This is the only ability with this interaction in the game.
* The blades will not stun nor deal damage if they do not converge (i.e {{cai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}}).
* '''Irelia''' can recast ''Flawless Duet'' during {{sis|Hexflash}} channel without interrupting it.

r1.name: Vanguard's Edge
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Irelia''' launches a barrage of blades in the target direction, expanding outward upon hitting an enemy champion and dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies hit.

After expanding, the blades drop on the ground, knocking all enemy units away from them, though not rendering them {{tip|airborne}}, and forming a spade-shaped perimeter around the enemy champion hit for {{fd|2.5}} seconds. Enemies that pass through the blades are dealt {{as|magic damage}} and are {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 90% for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
''The perimeter will point at the same angle '''Irelia''' casted it from, but based on the target's center.''
r1.descriptionHtml: Active: Irelia launches a barrage of blades in the target direction, expanding outward upon hitting an enemy champion and dealing magic damage to all enemies hit.After expanding, the blades drop on the ground, knocking all enemy units away from them, though not rendering them airborne, and forming a spade-shaped perimeter around the enemy champion hit for 2.5 seconds. Enemies that pass through the blades are dealt magic damage and are slowed by 90% for 1.5 seconds.The perimeter will point at the same angle Irelia casted it from, but based on the target's center.
r1.notes:
* Enemies that cross the perimeter are '''not''' {{as|marked|buzzword}} for {{ai|Bladesurge|Irelia}}.
* ''Vanguard's Edge'' will fire from '''Irelia's''' location at the end of the cast time.
